intro: A mystical comedy adventure with sarcastic British wit, a cartoon-style world, and an innovative shape-shifting ability for solving puzzles.
description:
** IMPORTANT NOTES BEFORE PURCHASE ** 

This game is being released in a chapter-by-chapter format.
When you purchase the game, you’ll gain access to two playable parts of the story: the Prologue and Chapter 1. Additional chapters will be released as paid DLC as they become available.
Chapter 2 is currently planned for release by the end of 2025, with the remaining chapters scheduled for 2026. Please note that these dates are tentative and subject to change.

** We recommend purchasing this game only if you are comfortable with this chapter-based release approach. **

Plot of the Druid is a classic-modern point-and-click game that’s reminiscent of Simon the Sorcerer, Discworld, and Harry Potter.

The game follows the story of a disgraced druid apprentice who embarks on a quest to restore balance and prevent the world from descending into madness. Along the way, he must strengthen his powers and acquire special abilities to navigate the amusing yet challenging world he encounters.
